headline.print_headline: Montoya Wins 1st IndyCar Pole at Pocono Raceway
headline.main: Montoya Wins 1st IndyCar Pole at Pocono Raceway

docs.snippet: In open wheel or a stock car, Juan Pablo Montoya knows how to top the speed chart at Pocono Raceway....
docs.lead_paragraph: In open wheel or a stock car, Juan Pablo Montoya knows how to top the speed chart at Pocono Raceway.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Team Spokesman Gets 4-Match Ban From Duty
headline.main: Brazil Team Spokesman Gets 4-Match Ban From Duty

docs.snippet: FIFA says it has suspended Brazil's team spokesman from matchday duty for the rest of the World Cup after he clashed with a Chile player....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA says it has suspended Brazil's team spokesman from matchday duty for the rest of the World Cup after he clashed with a Chile player.

headline.print_headline: Josh Wise's Fans Look to Unseat Earnhardt Jr.
headline.main: Josh Wise's Fans Look to Unseat Earnhardt Jr.

docs.snippet: Fans of Josh Wise now have Dale Earnhardt Jr.'s 11-year reign as NASCAR's most popular driver directly in their sights....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans of Josh Wise now have Dale Earnhardt Jr.'s 11-year reign as NASCAR's most popular driver directly in their sights.

headline.print_headline: Barney Hall Stepping Down as Lead NASCAR Announcer
headline.main: Barney Hall Stepping Down as Lead NASCAR Announcer

docs.snippet: Barney Hall, the voice of NASCAR as the lead announcer for Motor Racing Network, was scheduled to call his final event Sunday at Daytona International Speedway....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barney Hall, the voice of NASCAR as the lead announcer for Motor Racing Network, was scheduled to call his final event Sunday at Daytona International Speedway.

headline.print_headline: Cervelli Makes Error in 11th, Gives Twins Win
headline.main: Cervelli Makes Error in 11th, Gives Twins Win

docs.snippet: Yankees catcher Francisco Cervelli made a throwing error in the 11th inning that allowed Josh Willingham to score from second base, giving the Minnesota Twins a 2-1 victory over New York on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yankees catcher Francisco Cervelli made a throwing error in the 11th inning that allowed Josh Willingham to score from second base, giving the Minnesota Twins a 2-1 victory over New York on Saturday.

docs.snippet: Billy Hurley III shot a 3-under 67 on Saturday to extend his lead to two strokes over Angel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Billy Hurley III shot a 3-under 67 on Saturday to extend his lead to two strokes over Angel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic.

headline.print_headline: Hurley Extends Lead to 2 at Greenbrier Classic
headline.main: Hurley Widens Lead at Greenbrier Classic

docs.snippet: Billy Hurley III shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over Ángel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va....
docs.lead_paragraph: Billy Hurley III shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over Ángel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va.

headline.sub: "There is no peace for us"- Muslim in Myanmar
headline.main: "There is no peace for us"- Muslim in Myanmar

docs.snippet: Myanmar's Muslims say they are living in fear, as inter-religious violence flares in the country's second largest city, Mandalay. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Myanmar's Muslims say they are living in fear, as inter-religious violence flares in the country's second largest city, Mandalay. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

docs.snippet: Pinch-hitter Jeff Baker's RBI hit with two outs in the ninth inning helped Miami rally to beat the St. Louis Cardinals 6-5 on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Jeff Baker's RBI hit with two outs in the ninth inning helped Miami rally to beat the St. Louis Cardinals 6-5 on Saturday.
